file_content.text: Hope you like it hot, jactna. I'm not dying alone.
Maybe, maybe not. But you are dying.
If you say so. [Kill him]
Tell me what that console was controlling.
What did you just do?
You'll feel it soon enough. Every thermal shield in the network's about to fail.
Sounds like it's time for our exit.
The prisoners! They're all going to die.
We aren't here to free slaves.
That's not our problem.
Fine, but can we at least save the prisoners we find on the way out?
If we hurry, we might be able to get them out of here.
We'll save who we can.
Haha! Good luck.
Your point?
I should have known that's what you'd say.
Coward. May I?
Just make it quick. We've got to go.
If you want.
Just let him bleed out, he's not worth anymore of our time.
Don't bother.
Aim for non-vitals. I want him to die slow.
Make him suffer.
Ah! You--argh!
Kinda enjoyed that.
You... you scum! I wish I could live to see you crawl!
I wish I could live long enough to see you crawl.
Time for a bath, scumbag.
Okay, now you die painfully.
No! Back off, you--stop! Agh!
That hurt me just watching.
Serves him right.
One way to meet an objective.
That's quite a kit you're sporting, bounty hunter. Bet you spilled a lot of blood to get it.
Now, whose pride did I wound so badly that they resorted to a hired gun? The Republic? The Empire? Both?
Goodbye, Gradak.
I'm not here to talk. [Attack]
Hate to burst your bubble, but you're just the means to an end.
Think a lot of yourself, huh?
What makes you think either of them sent me?
Why would they do that?
After crushing their forces the way I did, why wouldn't they?
Doesn't matter. Whoever sent you obviously didn't warn you. Otherwise, you wouldn't be here.
You really have no idea who I am, do you?
In a minute, it won't matter.
You're history.
Gradak Ungan. Deserter. Pirate. Dead man walking.
I know who you are.
Is that right? I'm not some hack who couldn't cut it at boot camp, scumbag.
Just some ugly alien about to eat a blaster to the face.
Nobody worth remembering.
You've got no idea what you're into. Before that crack, I might have let you go if you begged.
I was one of the Republic's finest, merc. Best training, best equipment, best assignments. If they'd offered the best pension, I'd probably still be there.
If you came here looking for an easy kill, you made a grave mistake.
Get back to your own crew before I put you to work.
Burn, jactna... burn.
That all you've got, hunter!
